attributes.action: Make assault by kicking persons on the ground when they are defenceless attempted murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of the recent Newlove case, the assault by kicking a person on the ground when defenceless be legally classified as attempted murder. This can cause brain and vital organ damage,leading to death or permanent injury.
Also to ban or censor all movies and TV programmes where this type of assault is shown as that is where the culture of kicking a person when he is down originates. It is routine to show this type of violence and people do not understand the consequences.
